about_the_game:
《Robot Battle is a sci-fi action game. Players need to use random items to fight enemies in random levels, survive as much as possible, and finally find a way to escape from this planet. The rougelike elements of this game make each adventure completely different for players.
There are a total of 6 levels, which are randomly looped. In general, it will start on the first map as a capsule fall. In the game, you have to kill as many enemies as possible to get gold and health supplements. At the same time, the difficulty of the game increases as time goes on. Each battle in the game has a random map, boss, items and other related content. In the game, the player needs to find the waypoint on the map of each level and then open the waypoint. After the level boss appears, you must defeat the boss and wait for the portal to open 100% before you can activate the portal again and pass the level.
